name: Serverless Marketplace
desc: A serverless online marketplace where users can buy and sell their used items. Made with TypeScript, Next.js, PostgreSQL.

name: Web Scraper Battle Simulator
desc: See which Star Wars characters would win in battle. Made with Python, Flask, Typescript, Next.js, PostgreSQL.

name: Crowd Sourced Travel Planner
desc: Capstone project made with two teammates at OSU. Web app that allows users to plan trips based on other users' experiences. Made with Flask, Next.js, MySQL.
